name: SuezRun
description:
Everwood got stuck!

Your goal is to transport its cargo through the rock-ridden canal to safety. The more cargo you get there the better.

  • W - raise sails
  • A - turn left
  • S - lower sails
  • D - turn right
  • SPACE - drop cargo to gain more time before sinking

Assets used: 

Crashing sound: https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/352513/
